metadata.title: CVE-2024-50290 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: cx24116: prevent overflows on SNR calculusas reported by Coverity, if reading SNR registers fail, a negativenumber will be returned, causing an underflow when reading SNRregisters.Prevent that.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
